title: Aegis — NLP-Driven Video Intelligence Platform
summary: AI-powered video intelligence platform with transcription, semantic indexing, tagging, and search workflows.

title: CredScore — Explainable Credit Scoring System
summary: Transparent ML scoring engine with SHAP/LIME explainability and rule-based compliance components.

title: Real-Time Fraud Detection Engine
summary: Hybrid real-time fraud detection system combining temporal analysis, NLP features, and rule triggers.

title: SmartCare — Eldercare Analytics Platform
summary: Early rule-based eldercare decision support tool providing symptom evaluation and early warning insights.
